Contents of SPECIMEN

The SPECIMEN package contains a number of modules and subpackages, which are listed below.

Submodules

specimen.cmd_access module

Entry points to the code from the command line.

specimen.workflow module

Steps of the workflow to create a GEM based on a template model.

specimen.workflow.run_complete(config_file='test_config.yaml')

Run the complete workflow for creating a strain-specific model.

specimen.workflow.wrapper_pipeline(config_file, parent_dir='./')

Run the pipeline multiple times on a folder containing subfolders with subject annotated genomes and full genome sequences using the same configuration.

Parameters:

  • config_file (string) – A config file containing the general information to run the pipeline. The information for the subject and output place/name can be empty.

  • parent_dir (string) – Path to a directory to search for subfolders containing the data.

Raise:
ValueError:

No or multiple annotated genome files found: {subfolder}

Raise:
ValueError:

No or multiple full genome files found: {subfolder}
